programme.title: Jerusa's Day â€śo Dia De Jerusaâ€ť
programme.desc: The Day of Jerusa' narrates the encounter between Jerusa a resident of an old townhouse of Bixiga with the young Silvia which circulates through the traditional SĂŁo Paulo neighborhood doing opinion research on soap in powder.

programme.title: SiDiKi
programme.desc: SiDiKi is an inspiring feature-length documentary about a man who--despite his physical limitations--found peace in dancing and guiding others toward the same healing. This film will change the way you view those labeled as disabled.

programme.title: MONA
programme.desc: In June 1973, a week before the Portuguese Prime Minister, Dr Ribeiro, is due to arrive in London for a state visit, protests all over the city are growing due to Portugal's harsh foreign policy in its colony of Mozambique.

programme.title: A THOUSAND MIDNIGHTS
programme.desc: This experimental documentary chronicles the contemporary manifestation of the economic and social histories of Black Americans who came to the north during the Great Migration in search of economic opportunities. The implications of their migration, and the lack of economic opportunity they encountered, has far reaching consequences for Black America today.

programme.title: While I Breathe I Hope
programme.desc: Through the experiences of South Carolina Politician Bakari Sellers, WHILE I BREATHE, I HOPE explores what it means to be young, Black, and Democrat in the American South. Executive Produced by Charlamagne Tha God.

programme.title: JMAXX AND THE UNIVERSAL LANGUAGE
programme.desc: Jarrell Sullivan is a teenager with autism, who has a difficult time communicating with the world.

programme.title: DAVID'S REVEIRE
programme.desc: David is living his lifelong dream of becoming a star trumpet player when he is struck by epilepsy and the unpredictable seizures.

programme.title: Stiff
programme.desc: Tholang has been working as an undertaker in Soweto for as long as anyone can remember. Heâ€™s great with death, but not particularly good with life. Things go awry when his niece arrives to apprentice under him and manages to lose the corpse of an important politician.

programme.title: THE BILL
programme.desc: Lena and ten other women could not be more excited to celebrate Barbie's 35th birthday. When an unexpectedly huge bill arrives, the happy birthday dissolves into drama.

programme.title: The Beginning And Ending Of Everything EP1
programme.desc: Angelita returns home from prison in hopes of reuniting with the young child she left behind. When she discovers the child is nowhere to be found, she goes on a quest to find the baby, her hope, and her reason for living.

programme.title: FLY BY LIGHT
programme.desc: An intimate exploration of young people seeking to overcome the violence in their lives and create a new path for their future by connecting to a world outside their neighborhood.

programme.title: The Munchiez Ep 1
programme.desc: Join Jilla Johnson & Ricky Ellis as they ride along the ultimate cross-town foodie road trip, hitting up all the local hotspots across the U.S.! From American, vegan, and everything in between, you're sure to find everything you love and mo

programme.title: The Thorn of the Rose
programme.desc: Prosecuting Attorney David Lunga's success is overshadowed by the terrifying secrets of Rosa, a beautiful but mysterious woman with whom he falls in love. What mysteries does she hide? As the macabre facts unravel, David comes face to face with his own demons and is driven to prove his innocence, recover his reputation and, above all, clear his own conscience.

programme.title: PALM TREES DOWN 3RD ST.
programme.desc: While searching for her father, Nikki meets her half-sister Winter for the first time on the streets of San Francisco.

programme.title: Wingmen Episode 1
programme.desc: Three's Company': Theo arrives at the bar to help friends and married couple Jason and Lauren score a threesome in order to 'help' their rocky relationship. Here we are introduced to the series regulars and supporting cast in the form of Fatima, Byron, Jason, Lauren and Trina.

programme.title: Wingmen Episode 2
programme.desc: Three's Company': Theo arrives at the bar to help friends and married couple Jason and Lauren score a threesome in order to 'help' their rocky relationship. Here we are introduced to the series regulars and supporting cast in the form of Fatima, Byron, Jason, Lauren and Trina.

programme.desc: Three's Company': Theo arrives at the bar to help friends and married couple Jason and Lauren score a threesome in order to 'help' their rocky relationship. Here we are introduced to the series regulars and supporting cast in the form of Fatima, Byron, Jason, Lauren and Trina.

programme.title: Wingmen Episode 6
programme.desc: Three's Company': Theo arrives at the bar to help friends and married couple Jason and Lauren score a threesome in order to 'help' their rocky relationship. Here we are introduced to the series regulars and supporting cast in the form of Fatima, Byron, Jason, Lauren and Trina.

programme.title: BEYOND THE PASSGE
programme.desc: Six years after a mysterious event destroyed civilization, a young girl sets out on a lone journey in hopes of saving her ailing grandfather. Little does she know, she's not alone in this dangerous new world.

programme.title: Jazree's Court
programme.desc: Jazree's father was sent to jail for 7 years due to possession of an unloaded firearm. Jazree, who was close to her father, talks about the implication of growing up with him behind bars. Putting a person in jail doesn't just affect that individualâ€“it affects their entire family and community.

programme.title: Gonzo Episode 1
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. But once there is a clash in ideology between the schoolâ€™s Black Student Organization and Gonzo, Gonzo is pressured to step up, take charge, and be the voice of the schoolâ€™s black student body.

programme.title: Gonzo Episode 2
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. But once there is a clash in ideology between the schoolâ€™s Black Student Organization and Gonzo, Gonzo is pressured to step up, take charge, and be the voice of the schoolâ€™s black student body.

programme.title: Gonzo Episode 3
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. But once there is a clash in ideology between the schoolâ€™s Black Student Organization and Gonzo, Gonzo is pressured to step up, take charge, and be the voice of the schoolâ€™s black student body.

programme.title: Gonzo Episode 4
programme.desc: A drama that follows the struggles of black college students and their efforts to make reform on their university campus. But once there is a clash in ideology between the schoolâ€™s Black Student Organization and Gonzo, Gonzo is pressured to step up, take charge, and be the voice of the schoolâ€™s black student body.

programme.title: EMERGER
programme.desc: As the first woman to surf in her hometown of Dakar, Senegal, Khadjou Sambe emerged from a patriarchal system to become an icon for black women surfers all over the globe and pave the way for the next generation.

programme.title: Journey of Lion
programme.desc: Brother Howie is a Jamaican Rastafari who dreams of the land of his ancestors: Africa. On a journey in search of his roots and his identity he travels through three continents and (with great humor and sensitivity) discovers the world and Africa.

programme.title: The Invisible Vegan
programme.desc: The Invisible Vegan explores the problem of unhealthy dietary patterns in the African-American community, foregrounding the health and wellness possibilities enabled by plant-based vegan diets and lifestyle choices. The documentary begins with the personal story of Jasmine Leyva, a 30-year-old black actress and filmmaker

programme.title: The Unseen
programme.desc: The Unseen is about art, identity and solitude. It presents three interconnected vignettes that follow three different characters as they slip into spaces in Namibian society mostly unseen.

programme.title: BLACK ABROAD
programme.desc: Two friends document their experiences traveling while meeting with local transplants to explore the modern African Diaspora.

programme.title: Ujamaa: A Co-op Culture Story
programme.desc: Explores how government programs in the 1950s and 60s attempted urban renewal but sadly resulted in poverty and health food inequity in the historic African American neighborhood of West Oakland, California. Rather than focusing on the problem, this documentary illustrates how worker-owned cooperatives are an empowering vehicle to build a resilient, healthy community
